Name: start_word
Details: Word to signify beginning of a comment

Name: stop_word
Details: Word to signify end of a comment

Name: min_word_count
Details: Tell cleaner to remove words that occur less than min_word_count times

Name: remove_stop_words
Details: Remove stop words from the NLTK list of stop words

Name: mean_subtract_grams
Details: Subtract an averaged dictionary of all of reddit from each comment (usually implies remove_stop_words)

Name: min_score
Details: Minimum score required to keep a comment

Name: lowercase
Details: Lowercase all comments as part of preprocessing?

Name: sample_rate
Details: Proportion of actual comments to process from the given data [0,1]

Name: remove_links
Details: Should data cleaning remove all links?

Name: remove_punc
Details: Should data cleaning remove all punctuation?

Name: only_alphanum
Details: Remove all characters except alphanumeric ones?
